channel.title: [718] How do I make the server detect the player is in an area or out of it?
channel.description: Basically, I'm adding dungeoneering to my server and because once you enter dungeoneering it always thinks you're in it even after you've left (the only way out is to teleport) it still thinks you're in and you can't put on armor or summon.

item.title: [718] How do I make the server detect the player is in an area or out of it?
item.dc:creator: @AnderRoo AnderRoo
item.description:
@AnderRoo wrote:

Arcik:

Make a controller for this then you can do something like removeController() once the player leaves.

I just realized that

Read full topic
